Text: November CCP ClassesThe following FAS courses are updates of the same classes offered last year Registration will be opened to others in Global Accounting starting Monday so register this week if you plan to attend FAS BASICS INSTRUCTOR GINNY CATES DELOITTE TOUCHE DATE THURSDAY NOVEMBER TIME AM AM LOCATION EB FAS ADVANCED INSTRUCTORS GINNY CATES DELOITTE TOUCHE AND DAVID WILLIAMS ENRON CORP DATE MONDAY NOVEMBER TIME AM AM LOCATION EB Sign up on the ETax Website taxenroncom in the Training Section
